channel.title: Need An Developer And Help!
channel.description:
OK guys so i've made my own Rsps, pretty basic.
Its an 317 server , home town in edgeville etc.
So im planning to make an epic server, but i do need an epic coder. So what im gonna do is to change the home town to yanille , make forum , add shops were i want them to be, add pk areas, add more items, add more skilling areas, and make skills better, and bugfixes !
Want to see an picture of the server ? Here you go : " [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1zqwu2d.png[/img] "

item.title: Need An Developer And Help!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

This should be moved to the “Development Teams” section. Also, you don’t need an “epic coder” you need a decent programmer. If I’m being honest, I wouldn’t touch this with a 10 foot pole.

Read full topic

item.title: Need An Developer And Help!
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

sorry to say this… but u dont need an epic coder for ur requests. u dont even need to know java language. just get snippets lul.

Read full topic

item.title: Need An Developer And Help!
item.dc:creator: @anvary anvary
item.description:
@anvary wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:2, topic:426226”]You are not allowed to request coders.

Also, I suggest you get a new client.[/quote]

ah really didnt knew it.
Cause i reall need one.

If someone can help me add me on msn avenus@hotmail.no
or an pm !

Read full topic
